Articles.Content: Floor 5092: You see diagram showing how much thrust each engine produces.\\\
Floor 5092: You stay here... wondering how much of this information Bill compiled.
Floor 5093: there is a cannon that shoots firecrackers into the sky. At this point, it’s  shooting them 11 Miles above the ground.
Floor 5094: There is a screen displaying the current hight of the building, 15 and a half kilometers.
Floor 5095:You are so far that you can see your home galaxy

Floor 5095

You saw Mr.Beast purchasing an Intergalactic advertising media to make Aliens Subscribe to PewDiePie, and still wondering why you're here

Edited April 8, 2019 by GRS
Floor 5096. somehow your walking and running speed triples when you are on this floor, which is likely to escape from the growling creatures that are currently chasing you.

On 5/21/2018 at 6:32 AM, Gargamel said:

3044:  You find a door, engraved on it is a wild rose entangled around a revolver, yet you choose not to open it.

(Handful of Kerbucks to anyone who appreciates this one)

5097: your find hundreds of record players playing Sweet Child of Mine on repeat.

6 minutes ago, Kernel Kraken said:

5097: your find hundreds of record players playing Sweet Child of Mine on repeat.

Nope, but I guess it does sort of apply here...

1 hour ago, Gargamel said:

Nope, but I guess it does sort of apply here...

I'll take obscure references that sound like less obscure references for 300, Alex!

5 minutes ago, Kernel Kraken said:

I'll take obscure references that sound like less obscure references for 300, Alex!

5098:  This floor is full of limited edition, signed, copies of Stephen King books.

Floor 5099:  Some posters for a long-forgotten article, named "a"

Edited April 13, 2019 by Fraston

Floor 5100

You saw a Googolplex written out everywhere, this will take long to find all the Googol Zeros...(Googol = 1 followed by 100 Zeros, a Googolplex has that much Zeros)

Floor 5101 : Airlock of Skylab. You're about to enter the space station which in your knowledge, supposedly crashed onto the surface if Earth, but Skylab somehow have collision disabled that the station made it through Earth, then catapulted to its position now, outside Milky Way.

The station still has its rocket engine and maneuvering system intact and has Space Shuttle's external tank. You then tried thinking whether you've been lied or what regarding on the fate of Skylab. You entered the station, re-activated the whole station and regained control, then re-oriented yourself so that your solar panels pointed towards the brightest star from your sight. You see the fuel indicator shows almost full. However, a note next to the Mains Switch panel that you used to get the station back online says "Control room at 5th Floor".

On your phone, you received a daily feed saying that the Kerbol System is now near human's Solar System and exchange in technology will start around 5 months from now.

You realizes that a space station fully resembling Aincrad from Sword Art Online is floating near your current location, which equals around 10 floors. The mission control at Cape Canaveral and Kap Kerbaneral* (KSC) then informed you to dock to it then bring it to Earth orbit.

Spoiler

Well let's say that KSC's region is known as Kap Kerbaneral. @SQUAD, could this be added in the next update?

 

Edited April 15, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian
Tpyotptotptotpto

Floor 5102:

Willow lighting things on fire. Better move to the next floor!

Floor 5103:

There's a note that read's:

"Hey, thanks for buying the chips, BRB..."

You look around only to realize you left your wallet somewhere.

You cancel the credit card and get lifted to the next floor...
5104: Propaganda that can be summed up as "What the heck is up with this Pewdiepie vs. T-series war? Just subscribe to neither!" Civilised people (i.e. not me) will ignore this massage.
5105: Floor filled with small copies of Dres, all crying and screaming "I'M LONELY!" while rolling around. Advised to avoid.

5106 pics of noodles eating bears.

Edited April 16, 2019 by HansonKerman
wrong flor lel

Floor 5107 :

The Apollo CSM docked to the Skylab. You're piloting the station.

1 hour ago, Noah the Smol said:

5105: Floor filled with small copies of Dres, all crying and screaming "I'M LONELY!" while rolling around. Advised to avoid.

Since what supposed to be the control room is still a laboratory (Responsible for the tiny living Dresses), you, again, fly the station back to the Solar System.

See you at Earth's orbit!

(Next floor could / should be the station arriving at its destination)

Edited April 15, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian

Floor 5108

You brought that station to it's destination, and Dio was there...

2 hours ago, GRS said:

Floor 5108

You brought that station to it's destination, and Dio was there...

Uhh do you mean the band "Dio"? I did some Googling just now and only found Dio as a rock band.

Biar lambat asalkan selamat.

1 hour ago, FahmiRBLXian said:

Uhh do you mean the band "Dio"? I did some Googling just now and only found Dio as a rock band.

That Dio from JoJo, it's not so famous

Edited April 16, 2019 by GRS

Floor 5109 :

Approaching International Space Station.

15 minutes ago, GRS said:

That Dio from JoJo, it's not so famous

Oh. Thanks for that.

You docked at the ISS sucessfully but then you realize that Dio made it into Slykab before the second emergency docking port (Skylab did have it anyways) which docks to the ISS. You quickly float outta the Apollo CSM into ISS then Netizens start taking your picture for saving Skylab and rewrote history. Dio the geta blinded by the flash, and some authorities immeduately get to him and asked his identity. You said that's an anime character, who might be tracking you from behind stealthly. Dio then said he wants to stay at the station for at least 3 days then coming back down.

Three days layer, a SpaceX Dragon capsule awaits at one of the docking ports. Dio entered the capsule and left the station. You continued to stay until further actions taken.

Edited April 16, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian

Floor 5110:
A diagram shows that infact, the building is still entirely inside the atmosphere.
